description: NEW: SIX OCTAVES! DOUBLE KEYBOARD! You can now switch between playing one octave or two octaves simultaneously -- Multitouch Piano is a full featured Piano right at your finger tips! Each key was individually sampled and recorded in best CD quality (please connect external speakers for the best experience). The multitouch feature lets you play chords with up to four fingers at the same time, giving you the feel of playing on a real piano. Multitouch Piano features six full octaves of sounds reaching from C1 up to C6 and with the simple navigation you can easily find the right position for your tune. Individual enveloping of each sample gives every played note a realistic sustain and provides you with the most sensitive control possible. And now have fun jamming with Multitouch Piano!
